creator: Wyze Labs, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Wyze App is a platform that hosts a variety of smart home and personal devices. Join millions of Americans and connect all parts of your world with the ever-growing Wyze ecosystem. With Wyze, you can create simple automation in-and-out of your home adding a little magic and simplicity to your daily routines.

Wyze’s affordable price points finally make it reasonable to connect and automate your home. You’ll soon find out your favorite part about Wyze may be the way devices seamlessly interact with each other. Check out a few of the creative ways our community uses Wyze below:
- Turn your living room lights on when motion is detected with Wyze Bulb and Wyze Sense
- See what’s going on inside your home while you’re away with Wyze Cam
- Automatically lock and unlock your door without getting your phone out with Wyze Lock & geofencing
- Turn the radio on while you’re at work to comfort your dog with Wyze Plug
- Wyze Band, a smart activity tracker with color AMOLED screen, and typical activity tracking skills, and the function to show phone call and SMS on the band.
descriptionShort: Wyze App is a platform that hosts a variety of smart home and personal devices.

appDetails.developerAddress: 3933 Lake Washington Boulevard NE Suite 350, Kirkland, Washington 98033
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Fixed a bug causing a persistent notification for people not using Wyze Band

Wyze’s affordable price points finally make it reasonable to connect and automate your home. You’ll soon find out your favorite part about Wyze may be the way devices seamlessly interact with each other. Check out a few of the creative ways our community uses Wyze below:
- Turn your living room lights on when motion is detected with Wyze Bulb and Wyze Sense
- See what’s going on inside your home while you’re away with Wyze Cam
- Automatically lock and unlock your door without getting your phone out with Wyze Lock & geofencing
- Turn the radio on while you’re at work to comfort your dog with Wyze Plug
- Wyze Band, a smart activity tracker with color AMOLED screen, and typical activity tracking skills, and the function to show phone call and SMS on the band.
descriptionShort: Wyze App is a platform that hosts a variety of smart home and personal devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improved the update instructions for Wyze Sense Keypad
- Improved Home page data loading for Wyze Home Monitoring
- Fixed bugs that caused the user to get stuck during setup for Wyze Home Monitoring
- Fixed a count down issue for Wyze Home Monitoring
- Fixed a notification setting bug for Wyze Watch 44mm and 47mm

title: Wyze

creator: Wyze Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Wyze, based out of Seattle, WA, makes smart tech at super-accessible prices, trusted and backed by a community of over 5 million users just like you.

𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝘀.
Shop, set up, view, and interact. Craft the ideal smart home for you and your family, and then control your smart devices from our ecosystem of affordable high-quality tech – all tied together in an app that won’t stress you out.

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗺𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹.
Our first product was the trendsetting Wyze Cam: a multi-purpose indoor smart camera that helped our users keep an eye on what matters most without a hefty price tag. Now, Wyze has a full lineup of wired and wireless smart cameras fit for any occasion - whether that’s to serve as a baby monitor, capture proof of the pests in the garden, watch over your loved ones (including pets!), and nearly everything else. Wyze Cams are even more powerful when enhanced with our optional Cam Plus subscription.

• Wyze Cam Outdoor
• Wyze Video Doorbell
• Wyze Cam Pan
• Wyze Cam v3
• Wyze Cam v2
• Wyze Cam v1

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱𝗻'𝘁 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗸 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸.
Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Sense v2
• Wyze Sense
• Wyze Sense Bridge
• Wyze Motion Sensors
• Wyze Entry Sensors

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗰𝗵.
Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs? You can add focused illumination where you need it with Wyze Floor Lamp for tasks and hobbies or convert your existing lamps, light fixtures, small appliances, and more into smart devices with our lineup of smart plugs.

• Wyze Bulb Color
• Wyze Bulb
• Wyze Plug Outdoor
• Wyze Plug
• Wyze Floor Lamp

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲.
Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are here to help you track your wellness, stay connected, and jam out to your favorite music. From smartwatches and smart scales to earbuds and headphones, we’re sure to have the perfect product for living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝘀.
Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all. Select devices also can sync health data with our integration partners at Fitbit, Samsung Health, or Apple Health.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added Siren support and a Battery Usage Summary for Wyze Cam Outdoor (requires Wyze Cam Outdoor firmware version 4.17.1.123 and Base Station: 4.16.2.7)
- Added a Vacation Mode indicator for Wyze Bulb Color
- Added support for Wyze Lock Google Home integration
- Improved Smart Schedule for Wyze Sprinkler Controller
- Enabled no-go zone rotation for Wyze Robot Vacuum
- Enabled app sorting for Wyze Watch 44mm
- Fixed a bug that displayed the 12s limit icon for Cam Plus users
- Bug fixes

Now, Wyze has a full lineup of wired and wireless smart cameras fit for any occasion - whether that’s to serve as a baby monitor, capture proof of the pests in the garden, watch over your loved ones (including pets!), and nearly everything else. Wyze Cams are even more powerful when enhanced with our optional Cam Plus subscription.

• Wyze Cam Outdoor
• Wyze Video Doorbell
• Wyze Cam Pan
• Wyze Cam v3
• Wyze Cam v2
• Wyze Cam v1

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱𝗻'𝘁 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗸 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸.
Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Sense v2
• Wyze Sense
• Wyze Sense Bridge
• Wyze Motion Sensors
• Wyze Entry Sensors

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗰𝗵.
Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs? You can add focused illumination where you need it with Wyze Floor Lamp for tasks and hobbies or convert your existing lamps, light fixtures, small appliances, and more into smart devices with our lineup of smart plugs.

• Wyze Bulb Color
• Wyze Bulb
• Wyze Plug Outdoor
• Wyze Plug
• Wyze Floor Lamp

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲.
Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are here to help you track your wellness, stay connected, and jam out to your favorite music. From smartwatches and smart scales to earbuds and headphones, we’re sure to have the perfect product for living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝘀.
Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all. Select devices also can sync health data with our integration partners at Fitbit, Samsung Health, or Apple Health.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

- Changed minimum app operating system (OS) compatibility from Android 5.0+ to 7.0+
- Security improvements

Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Sense v2
• Wyze Sense
• Wyze Sense Bridge

Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs? You can add focused illumination where you need it with Wyze Floor Lamp for tasks and hobbies or convert your existing lamps, light fixtures, small appliances, and more into smart devices with our lineup of smart plugs.

• Wyze Bulb Color
• Wyze Bulb

Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all. Select devices also can sync health data with our integration partners at Fitbit, Samsung Health, or Apple Health.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Redesigned Shop to be the best place to shop for Wyze products
- Added Flash Sales, App Coupons, & Subscriber Discounts to Shop
- Added order tracking to My Orders & moved it into Shop
- Added 30s rewind & skip forward buttons to microSD playback
- Added grouping for Wyze Bulb White & Wyze Bulb Color with Wyze Light Strip
- Added support for multiple Wyze Home Monitoring contact numbers so Noonlight can call shared users
- Added grouping for Wyze Sense Climate Sensors
- Bug fixes

descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

descriptionHtml:
Wyze, based out of Seattle, WA, makes smart tech at super-accessible prices, trusted and backed by a community of over 5 million users just like you.

Our first product was the trendsetting Wyze Cam: a multi-purpose indoor smart camera that helped our users keep an eye on what matters most without a hefty price tag. Now, Wyze has a full lineup of wired and wireless smart cameras fit for any occasion - whether that’s to serve as a baby monitor, capture proof of the pests in the garden, watch over your loved ones (including pets!), and nearly everything else. Wyze Cams are even more powerful when enhanced with our optional Cam Plus subscription.

• Wyze Cam Outdoor
• Wyze Video Doorbell
• Wyze Cam Pan
• Wyze Cam v3
• Wyze Cam v2
• Wyze Cam v1

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱𝗻'𝘁 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗸 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸.
Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Sense v2
• Wyze Sense
• Wyze Sense Bridge
• Wyze Motion Sensors
• Wyze Entry Sensors

Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs? You can add focused illumination where you need it with Wyze Floor Lamp for tasks and hobbies or convert your existing lamps, light fixtures, small appliances, and more into smart devices with our lineup of smart plugs.

• Wyze Bulb Color
• Wyze Bulb
• Wyze Plug Outdoor
• Wyze Plug
• Wyze Floor Lamp

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲.
Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are here to help you track your wellness, stay connected, and jam out to your favorite music. From smartwatches and smart scales to earbuds and headphones, we’re sure to have the perfect product for living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all. Select devices also can sync health data with our integration partners at Fitbit, Samsung Health, or Apple Health.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Added links to the Wyze communities
- Improved the device sharing experience with people who don’t have Wyze accounts yet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Bug fixes

title: Wyze - Make Your Home Smarter

creator: Wyze Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Wyze, based out of Seattle, WA, makes smart tech at super-accessible prices, trusted and backed by a community of over 5 million users just like you.

𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝘀.
Shop, set up, view, and interact. Craft the ideal smart home for you and your family, and then control your smart devices from our ecosystem of affordable high-quality tech – all tied together in an app that won’t stress you out.

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗺𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹.
Our first product was the trendsetting Wyze Cam: a multi-purpose indoor smart camera that helped our users keep an eye on what matters most without a hefty price tag. Now, Wyze has a full lineup of wired and wireless smart cameras fit for any occasion - whether that’s to serve as a baby monitor, capture proof of the pests in the garden, watch over your loved ones (including pets!), and nearly everything else. Wyze Cams are even more powerful when enhanced with our optional Cam Plus subscription.

• Wyze Cam Outdoor
• Wyze Video Doorbell
• Wyze Cam Pan
• Wyze Cam v3
• Wyze Cam v2
• Wyze Cam v1

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱𝗻'𝘁 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗸 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸.
Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Sense v2
• Wyze Sense
• Wyze Sense Bridge
• Wyze Motion Sensors
• Wyze Entry Sensors

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗰𝗵.
Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs? You can add focused illumination where you need it with Wyze Floor Lamp for tasks and hobbies or convert your existing lamps, light fixtures, small appliances, and more into smart devices with our lineup of smart plugs.

• Wyze Bulb Color
• Wyze Bulb
• Wyze Plug Outdoor
• Wyze Plug
• Wyze Floor Lamp

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲.
Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are here to help you track your wellness, stay connected, and jam out to your favorite music. From smartwatches and smart scales to earbuds and headphones, we’re sure to have the perfect product for living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝘀.
Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all. Select devices also can sync health data with our integration partners at Fitbit, Samsung Health, or Apple Health.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Fixed a bug that prompted an app update when the app is on the most recent version

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Cam Plus Pro is now supported on Wyze Cam Pan v2.
- Added support for Wyze Light Strip and Wyze Light Strip Pro effects outside of Music Mode

- Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added support for Wyze Cam v3 Pro

- Added support for Canadian addresses to enable Wyze Home Monitoring in Canada

- Added AI Notifications for Wyze Cam v2, v3, Pan v1, and Pan v2 with a firmware update to limit notifications to Events you care about

- Added AI-only Events recording options for Wyze Cam v2, v3, Pan v1, and Pan v2 on the latest firmware to allow control over what Events you want to record
- Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Cam Plus Pro is now Cam Protect!
- Added a new alarm flow to Cam Protect that allows Noonlight agents to verify the video to help determine if there is a real threat
- Added Rule Explore Tab to help customers explore how Wyze devices can work together to make your home smarter
- Optimized the camera onboarding flow for Cam Plus users to improve the license binding experience
- Fixed a bug that prevented sound when playing 12-second Cam Plus Lite videos
- UI improvements
- Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added support for email Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
- Added a new Wyze Cam onboarding with a Cam Plus free trial and opt-out option
- Added Santa holiday AI detection to keep the magic alive
- Added the ability to hold the Request Dispatch button in the Monitoring tab to immediately call for help
- Removed the video verification process for Cam Protect armed systems in Test Mode
- Fixed a bug that prevented canceling environment hazard remediation when Wyze Home Monitoring is Disarmed

Now, Wyze has a full lineup of wired and wireless smart cameras fit for any occasion - whether that’s to serve as a baby monitor, capture proof of the pests in the garden, watch over your loved ones (including pets!), and nearly everything else. Wyze Cams are even more powerful when enhanced with our optional Cam Plus subscription.

• Wyze Cam Outdoor
• Wyze Video Doorbell
• Wyze Cam Pan
• Wyze Cam v3
• Wyze Cam v2
• Wyze Cam v1

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱𝗻'𝘁 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗸 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸.
Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Sense v2
• Wyze Sense
• Wyze Sense Bridge
• Wyze Motion Sensors
• Wyze Entry Sensors

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗰𝗵.
Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs? You can add focused illumination where you need it with Wyze Floor Lamp for tasks and hobbies or convert your existing lamps, light fixtures, small appliances, and more into smart devices with our lineup of smart plugs.

• Wyze Bulb Color
• Wyze Bulb
• Wyze Plug Outdoor
• Wyze Plug
• Wyze Floor Lamp

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲.
Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are here to help you track your wellness, stay connected, and jam out to your favorite music. From smartwatches and smart scales to earbuds and headphones, we’re sure to have the perfect product for living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝘀.
Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all. Select devices also can sync health data with our integration partners at Fitbit, Samsung Health, or Apple Health.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Changed the notification sound for Wyze notifications so that they’re different than standard phone notification tones
- Added support for an Event label for microSD card Playback for Wyze Cam OG
- Added support for an enhanced global notification setting with a snooze function
- Added support for showing the same SSID for combined 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands separately
- Optimized the Service page user experience and Cam Plus in-app purchase flow
- Bug fixes

- Bug fixes

Wyze, based out of Seattle, WA, makes smart tech at super-accessible prices, trusted and backed by a community of over 5 million users just like you.

𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝘀.
Shop, set up, view, and interact. Craft the ideal smart home for you and your family, and then control your smart devices from our ecosystem of affordable high-quality tech – all tied together in an app that won’t stress you out.

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗺𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹.
Our first product was the trendsetting Wyze Cam: a multi-purpose indoor smart camera that helped our users keep an eye on what matters most without a hefty price tag. Now, Wyze has a full lineup of wired and wireless smart cameras fit for any occasion - whether that’s to serve as a baby monitor, capture proof of the pests in the garden, watch over your loved ones (including pets!), and nearly everything else. Wyze Cams are even more powerful when enhanced with our optional Cam Plus subscription.

• Wyze Cam Outdoor
• Wyze Video Doorbell
• Wyze Cam Pan
• Wyze Cam v3
• Wyze Cam v2
• Wyze Cam v1

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱𝗻'𝘁 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗸 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸.
Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Sense v2
• Wyze Sense
• Wyze Sense Bridge
• Wyze Motion Sensors
• Wyze Entry Sensors

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗰𝗵.
Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs? You can add focused illumination where you need it with Wyze Floor Lamp for tasks and hobbies or convert your existing lamps, light fixtures, small appliances, and more into smart devices with our lineup of smart plugs.

• Wyze Bulb Color
• Wyze Bulb
• Wyze Plug Outdoor
• Wyze Plug
• Wyze Floor Lamp

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲.
Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are here to help you track your wellness, stay connected, and jam out to your favorite music. From smartwatches and smart scales to earbuds and headphones, we’re sure to have the perfect product for living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝘀.
Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all. Select devices also can sync health data with our integration partners at Fitbit, Samsung Health, or Apple Health.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added support for setting a motion detection zone in landscape mode on Wyze Battery Cam Pro
- Improved UI for schedules with inverse actions in Rules
- Improved UX when adding cameras to camera groups
- Bug fixes

- Bug fixes

Managing Your Account:

Your privacy and control over your data are important to us. If you wish to delete your account, you can easily do so directly within the app. Please follow these simple steps:

- Account Tab -> Account -> Delete account
- Tap the 3 checkboxes then tap Delete.
- Enter your Wyze account password again and tap Delete.
Upon deleting your account, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers, and you will not be able to recover any data associated with your account.

Our Health and Lifestyle products are designed to enhance your wellness journey and keep you connected. With our range of smartwatches, you can easily track your health metrics, stay updated with SMS and call notifications, and enjoy your favorite music on the go. Our smart scales provide detailed insights into your fitness progress, while our earbuds and headphones offer premium sound quality for an immersive audio experience. Each smartwatch is equipped with SMS/Call Log functionality, allowing you to see who is calling or texting directly on your wrist. Our products are committed to keeping you informed and focused on living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝘀.
Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all.

Managing Your Account:

Your privacy and control over your data are important to us. If you wish to delete your account, you can easily do so directly within the app. Please follow these simple steps:

- Account Tab -> Account -> Delete account
- Tap the 3 checkboxes then tap Delete.
- Enter your Wyze account password again and tap Delete.
Upon deleting your account, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers, and you will not be able to recover any data associated with your account.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are designed to enhance your wellness journey and keep you connected. With our range of smartwatches, you can easily track your health metrics, stay updated with SMS and call notifications, and enjoy your favorite music on the go. Our smart scales provide detailed insights into your fitness progress, while our earbuds and headphones offer premium sound quality for an immersive audio experience. Each smartwatch is equipped with SMS/Call Log functionality, allowing you to see who is calling or texting directly on your wrist. Our products are committed to keeping you informed and focused on living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm

Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all.

Managing Your Account:

Your privacy and control over your data are important to us. If you wish to delete your account, you can easily do so directly within the app. Please follow these simple steps:

- Account Tab -> Account -> Delete account
- Tap the 3 checkboxes then tap Delete.
- Enter your Wyze account password again and tap Delete.
Upon deleting your account, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers, and you will not be able to recover any data associated with your account.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

- Bug fixes

creator: Wyze Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Wyze, based out of Seattle, WA, makes smart tech at super-accessible prices, trusted and backed by a community of over 5 million users just like you.

𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝘀.
Shop, set up, view, and interact. Craft the ideal smart home for you and your family, and then control your smart devices from our ecosystem of affordable high-quality tech – all tied together in an app that won’t stress you out.

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗺𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝗹𝗹.
Our first product was the trendsetting Wyze Cam: a multi-purpose indoor smart camera that helped our users keep an eye on what matters most without a hefty price tag. Now, Wyze has a full lineup of wired and wireless smart cameras fit for any occasion - whether that’s to serve as a baby monitor, capture proof of the pests in the garden, watch over your loved ones (including pets!), and nearly everything else. Wyze Cams are even more powerful when enhanced with our optional Cam Plus subscription.

• Wyze Cam Outdoor
• Wyze Video Doorbell
• Wyze Cam Pan
• Wyze Cam v3

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱𝗻'𝘁 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗸 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝗸.
Keep an eye on your family and possessions with the award-winning Wyze Home Monitoring subscription, powered by our friends at Noonlight. It’s smart, straightforward, and ultra-affordable - that’s home security the Wyze way. For those that prefer to keep tabs on their home themselves, you can use motion and open detection from Wyze Sense alongside Wyze Cam detection notifications for self-monitoring instead.

• Wyze Home Monitoring Service
• Wyze Motion Sensors
• Wyze Entry Sensors

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗰𝗵.
Switch up your ambiance with our line of top-rated dimmable smart bulbs including Wyze Bulb Color and its impressive 16-million color range. Don’t want to swap out your bulbs?

• Wyze Bulb /Color
• Wyze Plug /Outdoor

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲.
Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are designed to enhance your wellness journey and keep you connected. With our range of smartwatches, you can easily track your health metrics, stay updated with SMS and call notifications, and enjoy your favorite music on the go. Our smart scales provide detailed insights into your fitness progress, while our earbuds and headphones offer premium sound quality for an immersive audio experience. Each smartwatch is equipped with SMS/Call Log functionality, allowing you to see who is calling or texting directly on your wrist. Our products are committed to keeping you informed and focused on living your best life.

• Wyze Watch 44mm
• Wyze Watch 47mm
• Wyze Scale
• Wyze Band
• Wyze Buds Pro
• Wyze Buds
• Wyze Noise-Cancelling Headphones

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝘀.
Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all.

Managing Your Account:

Your privacy and control over your data are important to us. If you wish to delete your account, you can easily do so directly within the app. Please follow these simple steps:

- Account Tab -> Account -> Delete account
- Tap the 3 checkboxes then tap Delete.
- Enter your Wyze account password again and tap Delete.
Upon deleting your account, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers, and you will not be able to recover any data associated with your account.
descriptionShort: The Wyze app is your gateway to a smarter life and a safer home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Fixed the issue that Battery Cam Pro crashed when clicking on the SD card in the event playback page

Auto-unlock your front door when you get home, auto-water the garden, auto-adjust the temperature, auto-vacuum the floors, and more. Reserve your home time for relaxation and fun instead of routine chores using our lineup of friendly smart home devices.

• Wyze Lock
• Wyze Thermostat
• Wyze Sprinkler Controller
• Wyze Robot Vacuum

𝗔 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗲𝗿, 𝗵𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂.
Our Health and Lifestyle products are designed to enhance your wellness journey and keep you connected. With our range of smartwatches, you can easily track your health metrics, stay updated with SMS and call notifications, and enjoy your favorite music on the go. Our smart scales provide detailed insights into your fitness progress, while our earbuds and headphones offer premium sound quality for an immersive audio experience. Each smartwatch is equipped with SMS/Call Log functionality, allowing you to see who is calling or texting directly on your wrist. Our products are committed to keeping you informed and focused on living your best life.

Your Wyze devices get even more powerful when they’re linked up with our integration partners. Whether you’re an Amazon Alexa user with an Echo at home, a Google Assistant user with a Google Home, or a DIY-er that likes to experiment with IFTTT, Wyze supports it all.

Managing Your Account:

Your privacy and control over your data are important to us. If you wish to delete your account, you can easily do so directly within the app. Please follow these simple steps:

- Account Tab -> Account -> Delete account
- Tap the 3 checkboxes then tap Delete.
- Enter your Wyze account password again and tap Delete.
Upon deleting your account, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers, and you will not be able to recover any data associated with your account.
